What are the key features of the Central Library at MUJ?
Tell me about the central library of MUJ
responses: The Central Library at MUJ boasts a spacious area of 2319 Sq.m., accommodating up to 700 individuals comfortably. Utilizing RFID technology, it ensures efficient access control and automated issue/return of documents. With a vast collection of 57,800 books spanning 14,500 titles, including over 3,000 reference books, the library offers a rich academic resource. Additionally, it subscribes to approximately 400 print journals, houses 450+ project reports, and holds 95 Ph.D. Theses. Moreover, the library provides access to 18 e-resources, encompassing e-journals, manuals, and reports, while also maintaining a CD/DVD collection of nearly 2,500.

Moreover, the library provides access to 18 e-resources, encompassing e-journals, manuals, and reports, while also maintaining a CD/DVD collection of nearly 2,500.

patterns: What is the admission criteria to join MUJ?
How to get admission into MUJ?
responses: All students who have QUALIFIED met TEST ( OR ) a JEE rank and have qualified for JEE Advanced in that year ( OR ) All other Students with Physics, Mathematics and English as compulsory subjects and who have 60 percent or equivalent in their 12th std.
Students with MET rank or JEE rank and qualified for JEE ADVANCED or having 60 percent above in 12th standard.
